definition: to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions/also written 振振有詞|振振有词
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: Her explanations for failure to do the work were voluble but not easily believed.
sentences.chinese: 她對於工作失敗的解釋振振有辭，但是很難令人信服。
